ability.Synchronize: If this Pokemon becomes poisoned, paralyzed or burned, so does the opponent.
ability.Mind Shield: This Pokemon takes 50% less damage from special attacks.

Psychic.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Moon Blast.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

Thunderbolt.effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Shadow Ball.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Ethereal Shield.effect: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.
